answers.answer: How often does this happen?  How long has it been a problem?  Are you getting a regular release (through masturbation or intercourse)?  Maybe you are not getting release often enough and your body is taking care of things on its own.  Aside from this, some medications and drugs have been known to create this issue.  Otherwise, I would talk to your doctor about it, as there are a few different organs that could be playing a part in it, and other things that could be going on.  Also, it may look like ejaculate, but may actually be discharge from an infection.

If you are never having sex and never masterbating, maybe its just dribbling out because it has to go somewhere. If you aren't getting off, start jerking off to clear it. If you are getting off and this is happening, then go have a doctor check it because you might have an infection.

The same thing happened to me. The only thing different was that I urinated then semen slow leaked out. My wife didn't take that to well.(Trust me) How can you explain that?? It's only been one week since we had sex.

myphisto, are you able to ejaculate normally during sex or masturbation?  do you have any history of diabetes?  are you on any medications?  what you are describing sounds like a condition called retrograde ejaculation, where your ejaculate empties into the bladder instead of exiting through the urethra.  so typically you will notice little or no semen during orgasm, but it will appear later during urination.  This is commonly attributable to diabetes, some surgeries, and some medications and deserves a trip to the doctor to find out what is wrong.for your consideration:http://www.nlm.nih.gov/medlineplus/ency/article/001282.htm

I have the exact same problem.  It started about one week after I started taking Cymbalta which also killed my sex drive.  I used to have sex or masturbate religiously pretty much every day, sometimes more than once a day.  Now I'm down to once every two or three weeks and when I do, it's very hard to reach orgasm which is very mild and I barely ejaculate at all.  In the past, I've been so regular that I've never had a "wet dream" in my life.I know it's due to the Cymbalta, I'm just curious as to the physiological mechanisms involved.

question: I've suddenly got a problem where I kind of feel a slight urge to urinate, but when I squeeze what actually comes out is ejaculate. I had not been horny or watching anything even remotely sexual and I was ejaculating, I did not get any sensation or orgasm either, It was almost as thought it were just leaking out on its own. Does anyone know if there's something wrong?
title: Random ejaculating
